SqlTable.SqlScriptCreate: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[AsteCommissioniDefault] ( [AsteCommissioniDefault_Ky] int IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL , [AsteNatura_Ky] smallint NULL DEFAULT ((1)), [AsteCommissioniDefault_Da] money NULL DEFAULT ((0)), [AsteCommissioniDefault_A] money NULL DEFAULT ((0)), [AsteCommissioniDefault_Commissione] tinyint NULL DEFAULT ((0)), [AsteCommissioniDefault_UserInsert] int NULL , [AsteCommissioniDefault_UserUpdate] int NULL , [AsteCommissioniDefault_UserDelete] int NULL , [AsteCommissioniDefault_DateInsert] datetime NULL , [AsteCommissioniDefault_DateUpdate] datetime NULL , [AsteCommissioniDefault_DateDelete] datetime NULL ) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[AsteCommissioniDefault] ADD CONSTRAINT PK_AsteCommissioniDefault PRIMARY KEY ([AsteCommissioniDefault_Ky])
